item.description:
MEET LOCAL SINGLES AND PARTY WITH US FOR THE LAST BLAST OF SUMMER AT THE CLUB GETAWAY RESORT

Saturday September 6 to Sunday September 7

Only 90 minutes from Hartford

Club Getaway is an ALL INCLUSIVE Resort that includes ALL food,
overnight accommodations and all activities

Plus these special Central CT Singles Events:

Wine Tasting with the Wine Expert
Trip and Hike At Kent Falls
Archery Class

Create Your Own Weekend - choose your favorite activities - everything is included!
On a Club Getaway weekend you pick the activity, you pick the pace.

The day is yours... and so are the choices. Choose from dozens of fun sports & adventures to cool parties & entertainment.

Or just kick back, relax and enjoy the warmth of the sun and the friendliness of the crowd.

All Inclusive Weekend including Food, food, overnight accommodations and activities
- only $280 + Tax =$329 Total ONLINE (Regular $349)

Buy Online and save $20!

Get your ticket before August 23, and get $20 of drink tickets FREE

Buy your ticket online with credit card, or call
Call (860) 236-3343 for more info

Pick You Favorite Activities - Everything Is Included!



All Inclusive Weekend including Food, food,
overnight accommodations and activities
- only $280 + Tax =$329 Total


Get your ticket before August 23, and get $20 of drink tickets FREE


*Water Ski, Kayak, Swim, Boat, Canoe, or Row on the Lake
*Mountain Hike
*Yoga with NYC's OM Yoga
*Lakeside Happy Hour: Live Music, BBQ Grill and Drink Specials
*Kayak Class on the Lake
*Lakeside Live Reggae Band
*Beginner Tennis Lessons with Pro Ken
*Basketball Clinic with Former NY Knicks Hollis Copeland
*Fly on the 350' Aerial Zip Line
*Cardio Kickboxing with Jen Fitness
*Intermediate Tennis Lessons with Pro Ken
*Mountain Bike on Single Track Trails for Beginners
*Rock Climb - Rappel Down a Rock Ledge
*Volleyball Clinic - Bump, Set & Spike
*Road Biking - Easy Ride on 21 Speed Specialized Bikes
*Hike Along the Appalachian Trail
*Latin and Swing Dance Class with Lucky
*Learn to Fly on the Trapeze
*Pilates with Jen Fitness
*Challenge the Climbing Wall
*Scuba Class
*Swing Dancing with Lucky
*Cooking Class with Connecticut Culinary Institute
*Golf Lessons with Silo Ridge Pro
*Bike Trip to Town of Kent
*Mountain Hike to Scenic Overlook
*Co-ed Volleyball - Open Play
*3 on 3 Basketball with Hollis Copeland
*Fly on the Bungee Trampoline
*Walk to Kent for Shopping or Ice Cream
*Advanced Tennis Lessons with Pro Ken
*Trip to Local Vineyard
*Co-ed Volleyball Tournament
*Texas Hold'em Poker
*International Lunch Buffet under the Tent
*Restauratore Italiano under the Tent followed by LIVE Music
*Party at the Boat House Lounge with DJ Craig Cruise. Aerial Acrobatic Show. Dancing till the wee hours.
*Midnight Campfire with Live Music and S'mores

Visit http://centralctsingl...

or call (860) 236-3343 for more info

See You at The Club!
